item.title: I love xerxes
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:24, topic:7985”][quote author=i.r.xerxes.plz link=topic=11250.msg126956#msg126956 date=1154783197]

davidude36, the winner of the faggot of the month award.

The prevous string of awards was by Xerxes, which was clocked at over 20 months in a row, since Xerxes is banned for this month he cannot compete.

What’s wrong, can’t you try and bash him alone? Do you need to gather your friends?

He’s an Xerxes wanna be, trust me…

Someone is jealous because he don’t have Miss. Chris wannabe, but no point because:

Miss Chris => Xerxes wannabe - Therefore anyone who is Miss Chris wannabe is Xerxes wannabe.

then since we cant laugh with you, the only other option, is AT![br][size=1]Posted at: August 05, 2006, 06:38:34 AM[/size][hr][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=11250.msg126717#msg126717 date=1154774296]
He’s an Xerxes wanna be, trust me…

hey cmon, someone needs to be the forum asshole while Xerxes is away

[/quote]

We already have the forum asshole, YOU.

<3 to all.
[/quote]
show me one post…ONE POST…where your not an asshole.

Posting too one of your homo friends doesnt count either[/quote]
Don’t ask ppl impossible things

Read full topic
